杮字的基本解释

杮
fèi
削木头，特指削去木简上的错误。
削下来的木片：“濬造船，其木杮蔽江而下。”

杮
bèi
木生枝叶。
树木繁盛。

杮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fèi］
［《廣韻》芳廢切，去廢，敷。］
亦作“柹2”。
(1)削下的木片、木皮。
(2)谓斫削木材。
(3)古数名。

杮字的康熙字典解释

杮字的起名意思

削下的木片﹑木皮。

杮
Basic explanation of words
杮
fèi
To cut wood, especially to cut off the mistakes on the wooden slips.
The chipped wood: "Jun builds a ship, and its wood sinks down the river."
杮
bèi
Wooden branches and leaves.
The trees are flourishing.
杮
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fèi］
["Guang Yun" Fang waste cut, remove waste, apply. ]
Also known as "Huang 2".
(1) Cut wood chips and veneer.
(2) It is called pruning wood.
(3) Ancient number names.
杮
